message.body: Mawnin! Text me later today to tell me how to keep the tongue up on my Converse. o_O
Im in my converse today too!!!! Lol, but no idk mine stay up
Ok. I'll play around with mine..... FYI Jacque and I are hanging out this evening ..... we all should get together one day soon.

Darnit! I have work this evening and free tomorrow night *hint hint* lol but yea I normally work every friday and sun night at my second job. Then get done work at 7 every night at my first job so if you guys do anything that works around that let me know! (I guess would be limited to sat nights and sunday mornings)
Sunday mornings? AWESOME!!!! Bring your Bible. We'll head over to the church!! :-) :-) :-) but yeah, Saturday works. Were you and Mia work friends?
Yea.. and ive gone to dinner with you guys where she was there too
Ok. Bcuz she said Saturday is better than a wkday for her. Ill schedule something up!!! :-) :-) Ttys!
Ok.. ill let u know details!
